title: Rotavirus vaccine
summary: Rotavirus vaccine is a vaccine used to protect against rotavirus infections, which are the leading cause of severe diarrhea among young children.[1] The vaccines prevent 15–34% of severe diarrhea in the developing world and 37–96% of severe diarrhea in the developed world.[2] The vaccines decrease the risk of death among young children due to diarrhea.[1] Immunizing babies decreases rates of disease among older people and those who have not been immunized.[3]
